struct VSOutput
{
	float4 Position : SV_POSITION;
	float4 UV : TEXCOORD0;
};


VSOutput main(uint VertexID : SV_VertexID)
{
	VSOutput output;

	output.UV = float4((VertexID << 1) & 2, VertexID & 2, 0, 0);
	output.Position = float4(output.UV.xy * float2(2, -2) + float2(-1, 1), 0, 1);

	return output;
}
